Several ''Minecraft''-themed '''gamerpics''' (or '''gamer pictures''') were available for purchase on the Xbox 360 Marketplace. They were sold in packs of 5, each costing {{price|1.00}} (originally {{microsoft point|80}}). Additionally, a Steve gamerpic and a Creeper gamerpic can be obtained as [[Xbox 360 Edition#Awards and unlockables|free awards]] for completing certain in-game tasks. These two gamerpics were not purchasable on the Marketplace.
